meanings.definition: Not altered or modified in any way.
meanings.sent1: The unedited photo showed the true colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to watch unedited videos to see the raw emotions.
meanings.sent3: The unedited essay had spelling mistakes, but it was still interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her unedited thoughts poured out in the emotional letter.
meanings.sent5: The unedited version of the song captured the artist's raw talent.

meanings.definition: Not revised or corrected for errors.
meanings.sent1: The unedited document still had typos that needed fixing.
meanings.sent2: She submitted the unedited report without checking for mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The unedited homework assignment had errors, but the teacher understood.
meanings.sent4: His unedited speech was full of mistakes, but it was authentic.
meanings.sent5: The unedited manuscript was filled with errors that needed correction.

meanings.definition: Not subject to editing or changes.
meanings.sent1: The unedited video was uploaded directly from the camera.
meanings.sent2: The unedited interview captured the speaker's true feelings.
meanings.sent3: The unedited contract was signed without any alterations.
meanings.sent4: Her unedited diary entries revealed her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The unedited version of the story remained unchanged and authentic.
